tables.name: users
tables.comment: ユーザー情報を管理するマスターテーブル

columns.name: id
columns.comment: ユーザーID|システム内で一意のユーザー識別子

columns.name: username
columns.comment: ユーザー名|ログイン時に使用する名前（4文字以上必須）

columns.name: password
columns.comment: パスワード|ハッシュ化されたパスワード

columns.name: email
columns.comment: メールアドレス|連絡用メールアドレス（一意制約あり）

columns.name: created
columns.comment: 登録日時|アカウント作成日時

columns.name: updated
columns.comment: 更新日時|最終更新日時

indexes.name: users_username_key
indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX users_username_key ON users(username)

tables.def:
CREATE TABLE users (
  id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  username TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL CHECK(length(username) > 4),
  password TEXT NOT NULL,
  email TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  created NUMERIC NOT NULL,
  updated NUMERIC
)

tables.name: user_options

constraints.name: - (Foreign key ID: 0)
constraints.def: FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users (id) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE MATCH NONE

tables.def:
CREATE TABLE user_options (
  user_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
  show_email INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  created NUMERIC NOT NULL,
  updated NUMERIC,
  CONSTRAINT user_options_user_id_fk FOREIGN KEY(user_id) REFERENCES users(id) MATCH NONE ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE
)

tables.name: posts
tables.comment: ブログ投稿を管理するテーブル

columns.name: id
columns.comment: 投稿ID|投稿の一意識別子

columns.name: user_id
columns.comment: 投稿者ID|投稿したユーザーのID（外部キー）

columns.name: title
columns.comment: タイトル|投稿のタイトル（最大255文字）

columns.name: body
columns.comment: 本文|投稿の本文内容

columns.name: created
columns.comment: 投稿日時|投稿作成日時

columns.name: updated
columns.comment: 更新日時|投稿の最終更新日時

constraints.name: - (Foreign key ID: 0)
constraints.def: FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users (id) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE MATCH NONE

triggers.name: update_posts_updated
triggers.def:
CREATE TRIGGER update_posts_updated AFTER UPDATE ON posts FOR EACH ROW
BEGIN
  UPDATE posts SET updated = current_timestamp WHERE id = OLD.id;
END

tables.def:
CREATE TABLE posts (
  id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  user_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
  title TEXT NOT NULL,
  body TEXT NOT NULL,
  created NUMERIC NOT NULL,
  updated NUMERIC,
  CONSTRAINT posts_user_id_fk FOREIGN KEY(user_id) REFERENCES users(id) MATCH NONE ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE
)

tables.name: comments
tables.comment: 投稿へのコメントを管理するテーブル

columns.name: id
columns.comment: コメントID|コメントの一意識別子

columns.name: post_id
columns.comment: 投稿ID|コメント対象の投稿ID（外部キー）

columns.name: user_id
columns.comment: コメント者ID|コメントしたユーザーのID（外部キー）

columns.name: comment
columns.comment: コメント内容|コメントの本文

columns.name: created
columns.comment: コメント日時|コメント投稿日時

columns.name: updated
columns.comment: 更新日時|コメントの最終更新日時

indexes.name: comments_post_id_user_id_idx
indexes.def: CREATE INDEX comments_post_id_user_id_idx ON comments(post_id, user_id)

constraints.name: - (Foreign key ID: 0)
constraints.def: FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users (id) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION MATCH NONE

constraints.name: - (Foreign key ID: 1)
constraints.def: FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES posts (id) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION MATCH NONE

tables.def:
CREATE TABLE comments (
  id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  post_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
  user_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
  comment TEXT NOT NULL,
  created NUMERIC NOT NULL,
  updated NUMERIC,
  CONSTRAINT comments_post_id_fk FOREIGN KEY(post_id) REFERENCES posts(id),
  CONSTRAINT comments_user_id_fk FOREIGN KEY(user_id) REFERENCES users(id),
  UNIQUE(post_id, user_id)
)

tables.name: comment_stars
tables.comment: コメントへのスター（いいね）を管理するテーブル

columns.name: id
columns.comment: スターID|スターの一意識別子

columns.name: user_id
columns.comment: ユーザーID|スターを付けたユーザーのID

columns.name: comment_post_id
columns.comment: 投稿ID|コメントの投稿ID（複合外部キーの一部）

columns.name: comment_user_id
columns.comment: コメント者ID|コメントしたユーザーのID（複合外部キーの一部）

columns.name: created
columns.comment: スター日時|スターを付けた日時

columns.name: updated
columns.comment: 更新日時|最終更新日時

constraints.name: - (Foreign key ID: 0)
constraints.def: FOREIGN KEY (comment_user_id) REFERENCES users (id) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION MATCH NONE

constraints.name: - (Foreign key ID: 1)
constraints.def: FOREIGN KEY (comment_post_id, comment_user_id) REFERENCES comments (post_id, user_id) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION MATCH NONE

tables.def:
CREATE TABLE comment_stars (
  id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  user_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
  comment_post_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
  comment_user_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
  created NUMERIC NOT NULL,
  updated NUMERIC,
  CONSTRAINT comment_stars_user_id_post_id_fk FOREIGN KEY(comment_post_id, comment_user_id) REFERENCES comments(post_id, user_id),
  CONSTRAINT comment_stars_user_id_fk FOREIGN KEY(comment_user_id) REFERENCES users(id),
  UNIQUE(user_id, comment_post_id, comment_user_id)
)

tables.name: logs
tables.def:
CREATE TABLE logs (
  id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  user_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
  post_id INTEGER,
  comment_id INTEGER,
  comment_star_id INTEGER,
  payload TEXT,
  created NUMERIC NOT NULL
)

tables.name: post_comments
tables.def:
CREATE VIEW post_comments AS
  SELECT c.id, p.title, u2.username AS post_user, c.comment, u2.username AS comment_user, c.created, c.updated
  FROM posts AS p
  LEFT JOIN comments AS c on p.id = c.post_id
  LEFT JOIN users AS u on u.id = p.user_id
  LEFT JOIN users AS u2 on u2.id = c.user_id

tables.name: CamelizeTable
tables.def:
CREATE TABLE CamelizeTable (
  id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  created NUMERIC NOT NULL
)

tables.name: hyphen-table
tables.def:
CREATE TABLE 'hyphen-table' (
  id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  'hyphen-column' TEXT NOT NULL,
  created NUMERIC NOT NULL
)

tables.name: check_constraints
tables.def:
CREATE TABLE check_constraints (
  id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  col TEXT CHECK(length(col) > 4),
  brackets TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL CHECK(((length(brackets) > 4))),
  checkcheck TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL CHECK(length(checkcheck) > 4),
  downcase TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL check(length(downcase) > 4),
  nl TEXT UNIQUE NOT
    NULL check(length(nl) > 4 OR
      nl != 'ln')
)

tables.name: syslog
tables.def: CREATE VIRTUAL TABLE syslog USING fts3(logs)

tables.name: access_log
tables.def: CREATE VIRTUAL TABLE access_log USING fts4(logs)

relations.def: FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users (id) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE MATCH NONE
FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users (id) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE MATCH NONE
FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users (id) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION MATCH NONE
FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES posts (id) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION MATCH NONE
FOREIGN KEY (comment_user_id) REFERENCES users (id) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION MATCH NONE
FOREIGN KEY (comment_post_id, comment_user_id) REFERENCES comments (post_id, user_id) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION MATCH NONE
